fixed.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: firmly fastened to a particular position
fixed.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a mirror fixed to the bathroom wall
fixed.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: fixed times, amounts, meanings etc cannot be changed
fixed.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The classes begin and end at fixed times.
My contract was for a fixed term of five years.
fixed.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a fixed smile, expression etc does not show any emotion or does not show how someone really feels
fixed.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Consumers spend a fixed amount on books regardless of price changes.
The option of converting gold at a fixed price had been cancelled.
